args.script: (function(){const visible=el=>{const r=el.getBoundingClientRect();return r.width>0&&r.height>0&&getComputedStyle(el).visibility!=='hidden'};const c=Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('input,textarea,[contenteditable]')).filter(visible);if(!c.length)return null;const el=c.find(e=>((e.placeholder||'').toLowerCase().includes('search')|| (e.getAttribute('aria-label')||'').toLowerCase().includes('search')))||c[0];if(!el) return null;if(el.id) return `#${el.id}`; if(el.name) return `${el.tagName.toLowerCase()}[name='${el.name}']`; const tag=el.tagName.toLowerCase(); const index=Array.prototype.indexOf.call(document.querySelectorAll(tag),el)+1; return `${tag}:nth-of-type(${index})`;})()
